verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Jonathelemrechokim <WH3128>, Michtam <WH4387> of David <WH1732>, when the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH270> <WH8800> him in Gat <WH1661>. Be merciful <WH2603> <WH8798> unto me, O 'Elohim <WH430>: for man <WH582> would swallow me up <WH7602> <WH8804>; he fighting <WH3898> <WH8802> daily <WH3117> oppresseht <WH3905> <WH8799> me.
Mine enemies <WH8324> <WH8802> would daily <WH3117> swallow <WH7602> <WH8804> me up: for they be many <WH7227> that fight <WH3898> <WH8802> against me, O thou most High <WH4791>.
What time <WH3117> I am afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>, I will trust <WH982> <WH8799> in thee.

In 'Elohim <WH430> I will praise <WH1984> <WH8762> his word <WH1697>, in 'Elohim <WH430> I have put my trust <WH982> <WH8804>; I will not fear <WH3372> <WH8799> what flesh <WH1320> can do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto me.
Havahry day <WH3117> they wrest <WH6087> <WH8762> my words <WH1697>: all their thoughts <WH4284> are against me for evil <WH7451>.

They gather themselves together <WH1481> <WH8799>, they hide <WH6845> <WH8799> <WH8675> <WH6845> <WH8686> themselves, they mark <WH8104> <WH8799> my steps <WH6119>, when they wait <WH6960> <WH8765> for my soul <WH5315>.
Shall they escape <WH6405> by iniquity <WH205>? in thine anger <WH639> cast down <WH3381> <WH8685> the people <WH5971>, O 'Elohim <WH430>.
Thou tellest <WH5608> <WH8804> my wanderings <WH5112>: put <WH7760> <WH8798> thou my tears <WH1832> into thy bottle <WH4997>: are they not in thy book <WH5612> ?
When <WH3117> I cry <WH7121> <WH8799> unto thee, then shall mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> turn <WH7725> <WH8799> back <WH268>: this I know <WH3045> <WH8804>; for 'Elohim <WH430> is for me.
In 'Elohim <WH430> will I praise <WH1984> <WH8762> his word <WH1697>: in the YY <WH3068> will I praise <WH1984> <WH8762> his word <WH1697>.
In 'Elohim <WH430> have I put my trust <WH982> <WH8804>: I will not be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> what man <WH120> can do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto me.
Thy vows <WH5088> are upon me, O 'Elohim <WH430>: I will render <WH7999> <WH8762> praises <WH8426> unto thee.

For thou hast delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> my soul <WH5315> from death <WH4194>: wilt not thou deliver my feet <WH7272> from falling <WH1762>, that I may walk <WH1980> <WH8692> before <WH6440> 'Elohim <WH430> in the light <WH216> of the living <WH2416> ?
